newsitem.title: UK: S&P AFFIRMS SUN ALLIANCE, UNITS RATINGS.
newsitem.headline: S&P AFFIRMS SUN ALLIANCE, UNITS RATINGS.

text.p: Standard & Poor's said on Wednesday it affirmed its AA minus claims paying ability ratings of the Royal & Sun Alliance Insurance Group Plc's main operating companies.
S&P also said in a statement it affirmed Sun Alliance & London Insurance Plc's A1 plus commercial paper rating.
"The ratings reflect the group's very strong market position, its potential to achieve solid earnings and robust capitalisation," S&P said.
"The group has yet, however, to set out its long term goals and strategies and the group's future will also depend on the degree of success achieved in merging the two organisations," it added.
